channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Search for UnitedHealthcare CEO’s killer yields evidence, but few answers
item.description: As the search for UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson’s killer stretches into a fourth day and beyond the New York City limits, investigators are reckoning with a tantalizing dichotomy.

item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO’s shooting opens a door for many to vent frustrations over insurance
FBI offers $50,000 reward for information about gunman who killed UnitedHealthcare’s CEO
